ygData.subject: RE: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: Plane of Fear = fixed. (3 seperate lands have been in there since it has been re-tweaked) Rogues....I think alot of their problems HAVE been fixed....except a
ygData.messageBody:
Plane of Fear = fixed. (3 seperate lands have been in there since it has
been re-tweaked)

Rogues....I think alot of their problems HAVE been fixed....except a few
things like failing poison if moving.....

And some classes need to be made weaker to balance the game....then
again...some also need to be made stronger to balance as well....


Bann

-----Original Message-----
From: John Erik Maynus [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: Friday, September 24, 1999 11:16 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Rez changed


From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>

I read on another e-mail list that on the test server they have done it once
again and they are now changing rez spells. This is what I've read.

Corpses that are older than 2 hours cannot be resurrected.
Corpses that are produced from a duel cannot be resurrected after 10
minutes.

I wish Verant would just leave things alone and fix the things that need
fixed like Plan of Fear, Rogues and things like that and stop making classes
weaker.

**************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
